text.section: No disclosures shall be required for any extension of a rental-purchase agreement.

law.history: Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 196, sec. 6, effective July 13, 1990; and ch. 304, sec. 6, effective July 13, 1990.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/13/90). This section was created by two separate 1990 Acts which are identical and have therefore been compiled together.
